description: Quality scoring criteria for generated projects

designConsistency.desc: All pages use one themePack unless explicitly multi-theme
No hard-coded colors/spacing in generated pages

layoutQuality.desc: Landing has a hero section in first 2 sections
Alternation of dense/airy sections; no 6 identical blocks in a row
At least 2 CTAs across landing + one near bottom

contentCompleteness.desc: All required slots filled (headline, cta, features, etc.)
Avoid placeholder text in final build

statesCoverage.desc: Forms have submit states + validation summary

a11yCoverage.desc: Buttons/inputs have labels; table headers accessible

responsiveCoverage.desc: No dataTable on mobile; fallback to cardList
Grid adapts at breakpoints; no horizontal scroll

appCompleteness.desc: Login route + guard present when RBAC enabled
Each entity has list/detail + (create/edit) if allowed
Settings + audit viewer exist in enterprise presets

performanceBasics.desc: Tables/lists virtualized when row count large
Marketing media lazy-loaded; images have sizes
